participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, with a playful spirit and love for rhythm.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Marco
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, with a passion for art and culture.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.
